DERMATOLOGIST TESTED

Gentle enough for daily use while reducing dead skin buildup.

FOR BEST USE

Apply to damp skin using a washcloth or loofah to build a rich lather. Rinse thoroughly. Apply BEVEL Moisturizing Body Lotion immediately after bathing to lock in moisture.

A SCENT OF YOUR OWN

Dark Cassis - Dark berries and botanical blooms blended with grapefruit, white musks, and vanilla.

KEY INGREDIENTS

  • Hydrated Silica - A naturally occurring mineral that gently exfoliates the skin to help prevent and reduce bumps and ingrown hairs.
  • Jojoba Esters - Provides gentle exfoliation of rough, flaky skin while leaving a soft, moisturized, non-oily finish.
  • Charcoal - Pulls bacteria, dirt, and other toxins to the skin’s surface to wash away impurities for the deepest of cleans.
  • Argan Oil - Packed with omega fatty acids, vitamin E, and linoleic acids, which work hard to moisturize and soften your skin without irritation or soapy residue.

MADE WITHOUT

Parabens, Artificial Dyes, Phthalates, Gluten.

Full Ingredients

Water/Aqua/Eau, Sodium C14-16 Olefin Sulfonate, Coco-Glucoside, Acrylates Crosspolymer-4, Glycerin, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Fragrance/Parfum, Cocamide Mipa, Caprylyl/Capryl Glucoside, Phenoxyethanol, Hydrated Silica, 1,2-Hexanediol, Citric Acid, Sodium Hydroxide, Ethylhexylglycerin, Disodium Edta, Sucrose, Charcoal Powder, Hydrolyzed Jojoba Esters, Zea Mays (Corn) Starch, Argania Spinosa Kernel Oil, Jojoba Esters, Hydroxypropylmethylcellulose, Polyvinyl Alcohol
